text: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.
author: Richard M. DeVos

text: Our souls may lose their peace and even disturb other people's, if we are always criticizing trivial actions - which often are not real defects at all, but we construe them wrongly through our ignorance of their motives.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

text: Peace is more important than all justice and peace was not made for the sake of justice, but justice for the sake of peace.
author: Martin Luther

text: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.
author: Thomas a Kempis

text: On all the peaks lies peace.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
